text: Tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena mati theke, pare sukrabindu theke, tarapara alakaha theke, tarapara tini tomaderake bera karechena sisurupe, tarapara yena tomara upanita ha'o tomadera yaubane, tarapara yena tomara haye ya'o brd'dha. Ara tomadera madhye karo mrtyu ghate era age'i ebam yate tomara nirdharita samaye paumche ya'o. Ara yena tomara bujhate para
